snippet: Federal health officials recommended on Thursday that all boys be routinely vaccinated against infection with human papillomavirus, or HPV.
abstract: Federal health officials recommend that all boys be routinely vaccinated against human papillomavirus, or HPV; since 2006, the vaccine has been recommended for girls and young women, largely because HPV infection can cause cervical cancer, but the vaccine also protects against genital warts in men and women, and lowers the risk of developing head, neck and anal cancers.
lead_paragraph: Federal health officials recommended on Thursday that all boys be routinely vaccinated against infection with human papillomavirus, or HPV.

headline.main: Officials Recommend the HPV Vaccine for All Boys
headline.print_headline: Officials Recommend the HPV Vaccine For All Boys

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
